item.title: Dicing Help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

if (itemId == 15084 && c.isTrusted == 1) {//dice bag c.diceID = itemId; c.getDH().sendDialogues(106, 0); } else if (c.isTrusted == 0); c.sendMessage("<shad=200>You need to be trusted to Dice, Failed Scam Tbh");

I have the isTrusted added in player.java and playersave.java
But when i make my character trusted, it says “You need to be trusted to Dice, Failed Scam Tbh”
How do I make it so when you click and your not trusted it sends that message?
